replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Sarah. We're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have anymore suggestions, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo.  -Chantal
Because I'm proud to be a Christian and many other Christians are , and many Christians are tired of hiding it ^.^ because we know now is the one to stand for the truth  David Scott
They can do that when Christians stop harassing gay-men who post shirtless pics or pics of them kissing their partners as "pornography"

What about all the gay men who Harrass Christians for not supporting them. Yes I will admit us Christians aren't perfect and we know that, and some make wrong choices like being rude to homosexuals, but what many homosexuals call hate and harassment, is in fact not, but the simple statement of not supporting their beliefs. Dave Babler
